The data shows polygonal and selected linear geological information, sourced from published BGS 1:625 000 scale maps of Great Britain. However, geological units are identified using the most up-to-date nomenclature that may differ from that on the printed maps. The maps are generally based on published material at 1:50 000 scale and compiled using techniques of selection, generalisation and exaggeration. The geology is fitted to a relevant topographic base at the time of production. Full UK coverage is available. The data is available in vector format. BGS licensing terms and conditions apply to external use of the data.
